devdoc.details: Only the VToken contract can withdraw funds

EnforcedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is paused.

ExpectedPause().details: The operation failed because the contract is not paused.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

params.token: ERC20 token address, use address(0) for ETH
ERC20 token address, use address(0) for ETH

returns._0: true if it's a VToken contract

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.token: ERC20 token address, use address(0) for ETH

devdoc.title: BridgeVault

InsufficientBalance(address,uint256,uint.notice: Thrown when withdrawal amount exceeds balance

InvalidWithdrawAddress().notice: Thrown when withdrawal address is zero address

NotVTokenContract(address).notice: Thrown when the caller is not a VToken contract

VTokenAddressAlreadyExists(address).notice: Thrown when VToken address is already added

VTokenAddressNotFound(address).notice: Thrown when VToken address does not exist

ZeroWithdrawAmount().notice: Thrown when withdrawal amount is zero

EmergencyWithdraw(address,address,uint25.notice: Emitted when emergency withdraw is executed

TokenWithdrawn(address,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when ERC20 token is withdrawn

VTokenAddressAdded(address).notice: Emitted when VToken address is added

VTokenAddressRemoved(address).notice: Emitted when VToken address is removed

isVTokenAddress(address).notice: Check if address is a VToken contract

vTokenAddresses(address).notice: VToken contract addresses, only these addresses can withdraw funds

withdrawToken(address,address,uint256).notice: Withdraw ERC20 token (only VToken contract can call)

userdoc.notice: Cross-chain bridge vault contract, responsible for receiving tokens and ETH transferred from other chains, and providing withdrawal functionality
